verses.verse: "Now these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes: <S%H7626><s%> from the northern <S%H6828><s%> extremity, <S%H7097><s%> beside <S%H413><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of Hethlon <S%H2855><s%> to Lebo-hamath, <S%H2574><s%> [as far as] Hazar-enan [at] the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus, <S%H1834><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> beside <S%H413><s%> <S%H3027><s%> Hamath, running <S%H1961><s%> from east <S%H6921><s%> to west, <S%H3220><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Asher, <S%H836><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> shall be the allotment <S%H8641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall set <S%H7311><s%> apart, <S%H7311><s%> 25000 [cubits] in width, <S%H7341><s%> and in length <S%H753><s%> like one <S%H259><s%> of the portions, <S%H2506><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side; <S%H6285><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> shall be in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of it.
"The allotment <S%H8641><s%> that you shall set <S%H7311><s%> apart <S%H7311><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> [shall be] 25000 [cubits] in length, <S%H753><s%> and 10000 in width. <S%H7341><s%>

"And the holy <S%H6944><s%> allotment <S%H8641><s%> shall be for these, <S%H428><s%> [namely] for the priests, <S%H3548><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> 25000 [cubits in length, <S%H753><s%>] toward the west <S%H3220><s%> 10000 in width, <S%H7341><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%> 10000 in width, <S%H7341><s%> and toward the south <S%H5045><s%> 25000 in length; and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall be in its midst. <S%H8432><s%>

"[It shall be] for the priests <S%H3548><s%> who are sanctified <S%H6942><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have kept <S%H8104><s%> My charge, <S%H4931><s%> who <S%H834><s%> did not go <S%H8582><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray, <S%H8582><s%> as the Levites <S%H3881><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray. <S%H8582><s%>

"And it shall be an allotment <S%H8642><s%> to them from the allotment <S%H8641><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> a most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H6944><s%> by the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>

"And alongside <S%H5980><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> [shall have] 25000 [cubits] in length <S%H753><s%> and 10000 in width. <S%H7341><s%> The whole <S%H3605><s%> length <S%H753><s%> [shall be] 25000 [cubits] and the width <S%H7341><s%> 10000.

"Moreover, they shall not sell <S%H4376><s%> or exchange <S%H4171><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of it, or alienate <S%H5674><s%> this choice <S%H7225><s%> [portion] of land; <S%H776><s%> for it is holy <S%H6944><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And the remainder, <S%H3498><s%> 5000 [cubits] in width <S%H7341><s%> and 25000 in length, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> shall be for common <S%H2455><s%> use <S%H2455><s%> for the city, <S%H5892><s%> for dwellings <S%H4186><s%> and for open <S%H4054><s%> spaces; <S%H4054><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be in its midst. <S%H8432><s%>

"And these <S%H428><s%> [shall be] its measurements: <S%H4060><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits,] the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits,] the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits,] and the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits.]

"And the city <S%H5892><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> open <S%H4054><s%> spaces: <S%H4054><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> 250 [cubits,] on the south <S%H5045><s%> 250 [cubits,] on the east <S%H6921><s%> 250 [cubits,] and on the west <S%H3220><s%> <S%H250><s%> [cubits.]

"And the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of the length <S%H753><s%> alongside <S%H5980><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> allotment <S%H8641><s%> shall be 10000 [cubits] toward the east 6921, and 10000 toward the west; <S%H3220><s%> and it shall be alongside <S%H5980><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> allotment. <S%H8641><s%> And its produce <S%H8393><s%> shall be food <S%H3899><s%> for the workers <S%H5647><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>
"And the workers <S%H5647><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall cultivate <S%H5647><s%> it.

"The whole <S%H3605><s%> allotment <S%H8641><s%> [shall be] 25000 by 25000 [cubits;] you shall set <S%H7311><s%> apart <S%H7311><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> allotment, <S%H8641><s%> a square, <S%H7243><s%> with the property <S%H272><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

"And the remainder <S%H3498><s%> [shall be] for the prince, <S%H5387><s%> on the one <S%H2088><s%> side <S%H2088><s%> and on the other <S%H2088><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> allotment <S%H8641><s%> and of the property <S%H272><s%> of the city; <S%H5892><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the 25000 [cubits] of the allotment <S%H8641><s%> toward <S%H5704><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> and westward <S%H3220><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the 25000 toward <S%H5921><s%> the west <S%H3220><s%> border, <S%H1366><s%> alongside <S%H5980><s%> the portions, <S%H2506><s%> [it shall be] for the prince. <S%H5387><s%> And the holy <S%H6944><s%> allotment <S%H8641><s%> and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall be in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of it.

"And exclusive <S%H4480><s%> of the property <S%H272><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> and the property <S%H272><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> [which <S%H834><s%>] are in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of that which belongs <S%H1961><s%> to the prince, <S%H5387><s%> [everything] between <S%H996><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> shall be for the prince. <S%H5387><s%>

"As for the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the tribes: <S%H7626><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> Gad, <S%H1410><s%> one <S%H259><s%> [portion.]

"And beside <S%H5921><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> at the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> toward the south, <S%H8486><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> shall be from Tamar <S%H8559><s%> to the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribath-kadesh, to the brook <S%H5158><s%> [of Egypt,] to the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>

"This <S%H2088><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall divide <S%H5307><s%> by lot <S%H5307><s%> to the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are their [several] portions, <S%H4256><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
"And these <S%H428><s%> are the exits <S%H8444><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits] by measurement, <S%H4060><s%>

shall be the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> named <S%H5921><s%> <S%H8034><s%> for the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> gates <S%H8179><s%> toward the north: <S%H6828><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

"And on the east <S%H6921><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits,] shall be three <S%H7969><s%> gates: <S%H8179><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

"And on the south <S%H5045><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits] by measurement, <S%H4060><s%> shall be three <S%H7969><s%> gates: <S%H8179><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

"On the west <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> 4500 [cubits, shall be] three <S%H7969><s%> gates: <S%H8179><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> one; <S%H259><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

"[The city <S%H5892><s%> shall be] 18000 [cubits] round <S%H5439><s%> about; <S%H5439><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city from [that] day <S%H3117><s%> [shall be,] 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is there. <S%H8033><s%>'"
